separt separate causative of part s'par > ⲉⲃⲟⲗ Spalt

𓉐 ⲉⲃⲟⲗ 𓋴 𓇼 𓃀 𓉐 s'part port שַׁעַר shá'ar "gate" 𓈈 sparte 𓋴 𓊪 𓏏 𓈈 satrap vs 𓈈 𒉆 νομός nome name omen 𓊁
𓐛 sparte > side ?

While the familiar part root is ubiquitous in Egyptian, separate is much less clear:
The 'P' of 'separate' is missing or hidden:
𓆓 𓊃 𓂋 𓂡 | separate (from) |zerr? Tschüßer / 'Abschiez'
𓆓 𓋴 𓂋 𓂦 | separate (from), raise, clear (a road), support | interstingly separate ⋍ support
𓃛 𓅱 𓂧 | separate (x from y) | ??? chien ⋍ schnitt ? ⇔ Teil ⇔ Kalb ?

One might need to look into carve / scar to understand the forms.
